titles.title: Federal Contractors Accountability Act
Federal Contractors Accountability Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to apply a 100 percent continuous levy to Medicare providers and certain Federal contractors with delinquent tax debt.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Federal Contractors Accountability Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the 100% continuous tax levy for delinquent taxes to include payments to Medicare providers and suppliers and payments due to vendors of real property sold or leased to the federal government.
